    Class
    Description
    ActivationFunction
    An ActivationFunction maps a logit to an output.
    Linear
    This activation function, also known as Identity or "no-activation" just returns the logit as output.
    ReLU
    Implements the Rectified Linear Unit (ReLU).
    Sigmoid
    Concrete ActivationFunction implementing the logistic sigmoid:
    Step
    Implements the step activation.
